Julien Vinson (1843–1926 or 1927)

rdf:Description.dc:subject: Basques -- France Folklore
Basques -- Folklore
Tales -- France Pays Basque
Legends -- France Pays Basque
Pays Basque (France) -- Social life and customs
Basque -- Language
rdf:Description.dc:description: A collection of Basque legends, complete with an appendix on the Basque language and Basque poetry. Includes a short bibliography.
